text: Arnold Jacob "Red" Auerbach (September 20, 1917 â€“ October 28, 2006) was an American professional basketball coach and executive. He served as a head coach in the National Basketball Association (NBA), most notably with the Boston Celtics. He was also the head coach of the Washington Capitols and Tri- Cities Blackhawks. title: Red Auerbach
